cause.description:
There is a fast growing craze hitting the shores of South Africa at fast pace. Believe it or not, youngsters and adults alike are purchasing hamsters for 1 purpose "Hamster fighting". The hamsters are trained from a young age to attack and mutilate any rodent that comes in its path. The hamsters are thrown into a pit and poked with tooth picks till they enter there fight till death. Owners known as "hamster fighters" place bets of up to R20 000. A shocking fait awates thousands of hamsters in South Africa today! Not if you act now, show everyone that you care about the future of hamsters in South Africa. Join us now...
1. Stop canabolic hamster training.
2. Stop Hamster fighting in SA.
3. Create a awareness of hamster fighting in sa.
cause.name: Hamster fighting
